snippet: Yale’s Jack Montague hit a 3-point shot with 1.7 seconds remaining to give the visiting Bulldogs a stunning 45-44 upset win over defending national champion UConn on Friday night.
abstract: Yale defeats UConn, 45-44, in men's college basketball; other men's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Yale’s Jack Montague hit a 3-point shot with 1.7 seconds remaining to give the visiting Bulldogs a stunning 45-44 upset win over defending national champion UConn on Friday night.
